code: import React from'react';import classNames from'classnames';import{withRouter}from'react-router-dom';function Page(_ref){var children=_ref.children,color=_ref.color,background=_ref.background,state=_ref.location.state;var cx=classNames({page:true,'page--prev':state&&state.prev});return React.createElement("div",{className:cx,style:{color:color,background:background}},children);}Page.defaultProps={};export default withRouter(Page);
